marqueeText.text: Check out the latest RRE POV podcast feat. Matt Rendall, CEO of Clearpath Robotics & OTTO Motors

subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Sign up with your email address to receive news and updates.

global.title: RRE
global.description: B&B Group builds a better tomorrow, today.

sections.title: Portfolio
sections.subtitle: We invest in early-stage, tech-enabled companies across all sectors and across the country.

portfolio.description: 1up is a new knowledge automation platform for Sales teams. Businesses use 1up to automate complex sales questions, respond to customer objections, and complete RFP questionnaires.

8i is the industry leader in the capture, transformation, and streaming of holograms. Their proprietary technology empowers creators to bring real people into volumetric virtual experiences.  With volumetric VR, creators can push the boundaries of storytelling and explore an entirely new medium for human communication.
Abra is a digital asset financial platform where consumers and institutions can buy, sell, store, borrow, and generate yield on crypto.
Achex enables secure internet payments for buyers and sellers.

Aclaimant has evolved into an insight-driven workflow solution for safety and risk management that is configurable to all categories of incidents and industries. Aclaimant helps to uncover problems that companies may not know they have and fundamentally changes the way organizations actively manage risk.
Aconite is a platform for discovering stories that transform the mundane world into something extraordinary - stories that sit at the intersection of adventure, narrative and game.
Amicus allows non-profit organizations to turn their supporters into advocates and fundraisers.
Amount builds software that re-engineers consumer, small business, and embedded finance solutions to make banking simpler, safer and more convenient for today’s digital-first customer.

Anomaly is a precision payments platform that uses artificial intelligence and novel data sources to streamline healthcare billing and improve payment accuracy, a problem that costs the U.S. healthcare system more than $300 billion annually. Anomaly reduces friction between payers and providers by ensuring the payment process is accurate, streamlined, and trusted.

AppliedEA reduces the high failure rates and overwhelming maintenance costs of manned and autonomous mobile machines by providing a real-time software-only solution that continuously monitors, analyzes and services these systems and allows them to meet, and exceed, critical operational and supply chain performance benchmarks.
Apriva is a leading provider of end-to-end wireless transactions, gateway services, and secure information solutions.
Arca is an asset management firm offering institutional-caliber products for sophisticated investors to confidently gain exposure to digital assets.
Artivest provides access at lower investment minimums to a select assortment of privately offered alternative investment funds.

Avant makes it easier and cheaper for people around the world to borrow money responsibly. Avant does this by using the latest technology and statistical methods to create products that solve their customers' unique financial needs.
Bark is the company behind BarkBox, a subscription-based e-commerce and content company for dog lovers.
Base empowers companies to take a scientific sales approach with solutions that drive adoption, big data analysis, and actionable insights.
Basno is a web platform that allows organizations and individuals to create and collect digital badges.
Bustle Digital Group is a media company that provides digital media, advertising and publishing services.
Beeswax offers Bidder-as-a-Service solution that is scalable, customizable, cloud-based programmatic bidding platform.
Bend delivers industry disrupting products and services that revolutionize an individual's relationship with their Health Savings Account (HSA), resulting in greater adoption and utilization.
Betaworks invests, accelerates, and builds companies and projects from scratch — focusing on AI and Augmentation, LLM's, NLP,  web3 rails and applied machine learning.
Binance.US provides a regulated marketplace built on cutting-edge technology for everyday access to digital assets.
BioLite is a social enterprise that develops, manufactures and markets consumer energy products for off-grid communities around the world.
Bitly is a link management platform that helps brands deliver and measure their marketing efforts across all channels.
Bitnomial, started in late 2014 by algorithmic traders, offers improved derivatives exchange technology coupled with new digital asset settlement systems.

BitPay is the best crypto app to pay with crypto and accept crypto payments. BitPay's merchant tools enable businesses to accept a payment instantly from anywhere on the planet, with no risk of fraud.

BlackSky Global is a satellite-imaging-as-a-service startup based in Seattle.  Through its Spectra AI SaaS platform, powered by proprietary space and terrestrial sensor network, BlackSky delivers information, insights, and analytics that matter most to ensure businesses, nonprofits, and governments make well-informed decisions.
The Black Tux is the first suit and tuxedo rental that doesn't feel like one-”simple, stylish, and affordable.

Blockdaemon is a blockchain deployment facilitator that manages nodes and payment rails for blockchain networks. Their solution is fully portable, it allows its user to switch networks and chains with the click of a button, so they don't have to worry about picking the perfect network configuration from day one. They support the blockchaindeveloper ecosystem with best-of-breed dev-ops advice.
Bolt is the world's most intelligent payments platform that helps retailers convert and retain more of their shoppers.

Boom Supersonic is a commercial airplane manufacturer that builds supersonic airliners designed for speed, safety, and sustainability.  Boom is building a global supersonic future, with a mission to make the world dramatically more accessible and affordable.

Boost enables any company to build, launch, and scale digital insurance products through a fully embedded experience within their own front-end environments. Boost's infrastructure-as-a-service platform significantly reduces the cost of building and managing an insurance company by packaging the necessary operational, compliance, and capital components and making them accessible through simple API integration.

Booster is energy delivered, integrated logistics, and society’s solution for decarbonizing last-mile delivery.  Booster has reinvented a cleaner fuel delivery service to bring the energy directly from source to vehicle.
Bowery Farming uses vision systems, automation technology, and machine learning to monitor plants and their growth.
Braintree's payment platform provides all the tools online and mobile businesses need to accept payments.

Branch makes it easy for teams of any size to create an office they'll love.  Branch provides end-to-end service: space design, delivery, white glove installation, and even the ability to trade in used furniture.
Bread Financial is a tech-forward financial services company that offers simple, personalized payment, lending and saving solutions.

Breather is an app and a provider of space-as-a-service, with a growing network of private work spaces built for productivity.  Now part of the Industrious family,  Breather gives teams and individuals private space to focus and innovate, without the distractions of shared coworking spaces and overcrowded offices.
Brightwheel is the first all-in-one software platform for preschools, childcare providers, camps, and afterschool programs - trusted by thousands of educators and millions of families.
BroadSoft is the leading global provider of software that enables mobile, fixed-line and cable service providers to deliver real-time communications over their IP networks.

Business Insider is an online platform that offers the latest business, celebrity, and technology news across America. The platform also covers technology, finance, politics, strategy, life, sports, and more. The site also provides and analyzes business news and acts as an aggregator of top news stories from around the web. It also offers in-depthinsight, data and analysis of the digital landscape, from e-commerce and payments to the Internet of Things and fintech.
Bustle Digital Group is a news, entertainment, lifestyle, and fashion website that caters to women.
BuzzFeed is a cross-platform digital media company delivering news and entertainment content to a global audience.
CAMP is a family experience company known for its unique shop/play hybrid experience in physical locations across the country and its kid-friendly e-Commerce site.

Capitalize makes it easier to save for retirement. Using thoughtful design and modern technology, Capitalize helps users digitally find old retirement accounts, open new ones, and transfer assets seamlessly. Starting with their digital rollover solution, Capitalize is on a mission to take the pain (and paperwork) out of retirement accounts.
Care/of is a healthcare technology company dedicated to simplifying consumer health, starting with a fully personalized vitamin pack.
Cloud architecture platform enabling companies to excel with cloud native tech stacks, focused on tech stack evaluation, planning, and evolution, with the help of AI.
Certeon provided appliance software solutions that eliminated traditional network constraints and accelerated application performance.
Certificate Hero is a SaaS platform which allows insurance brokers and their clients to efficiently and accurately issue and manage Certificates of Insurance from start to finish.
Chain is a blockchain-based technology company on a mission to enable a smarter and more connected economy.
Citizen is the No. 1 public safety app in the U.S., with a mission to make the world a safer place.
Clarity Money empowers and saves users money with transformative financial organization, transparency and advocacy.
ClearGraph enables smart data discovery and data analysis through natural language query technology.
Clearpath provides self-driving vehicle technology and services for research and industrial clients.

Clearstep Health is an AI care navigation platform that matches patients to the right level of care based on their symptoms, insurance, and location, ultimately helping them book the best in-person or virtual care.
Clyde is a product lifecycle platform that aims to assist businesses to increase profits and provide their clients with high-quality services.
Coherence is a software development company that empowers every company's software team.

Collective Health is the leading health benefits platform that brings together medical, dental, vision, pharmacy, and program partners into an integrated solution that better enables employees and their families to understand, navigate, and pay for healthcare.
Complete Sleep is modernizing the sleep apnea testing and treatment process by minimizing the number of appointments required and moving the process online.
Conceal is a cybersecurity company that helps companies and enterprises defend against the threat vector.
Concur simplifies travel, expense and invoice management for total visibility and greater control.
CoverHound is a technology company offering a platform for consumers to shop for car insurance.
Culinary Agents is a website to find career-related information about the hospitality industry.

Cyota was a leading player in the anti-fraud space, specializing in financial institutions. It specialized in fraud related to the Internet, such as online banking fraud, eCommerce fraud and phishing. Cyota was acquired by RSA Security (NASDAQ:RSAS)
Datadog offers monitoring and analytics for cloud-based workflows.
Digital Currency Group builds and supports bitcoin and blockchain companies by leveraging insights, network, and access to capital.
Digital Genius is an artificial intelligence platform that puts customer support on autopilot by understanding conversations and automating repetitive processes and their customers.
Dirty Lemon is the first consumer brand in the world to sell products exclusively via text message.

Domain Money is an all-in-one wealth management app designed to make it easy for customers to access expert financial advice from anywhere, anytime. Unlike traditional advisors, Domain Money advisors proactively manage
customer savings, investments, taxes, and insurance all in one easy-to-access app.
Dots is a minimalist game that was designed to be a soothing experience. But dig deeper and there is a depth of challenging gameplay for more competitive players.
Drop.io was a platform enabling users to create simple private exchange points called drops.
eMachines manufactures and distributes PCs that focuses on the low-end sector of the market.
Earn money for replying to emails and completing tasks.
Edmund is an institutional-grade custodian of digital wealth, bringing peace of mind, bespoke service, and yield opportunities to institutional investors and asset issuers.
Elmntri is a startup studio that creates consumer healthcare startups for the US market and offers an entrepreneur-in-residence program.
Ember provides wireless sensor and control network technologies, enabling energy efficiency improvements for various business institutions.
Enpirion is an analog semiconductor company offering highly integrated power management solutions.

Extricity offers B2B software products which allow organizations to manage the internal and external sharing of information, and also enables interactions among software applications and business partners over the internet.
Fi is building the next generation of technology for the modern dog owner.
Filecoin is an open-source, public cryptocurrency and digital payment system intended to be a blockchain-based cooperative digital storage and data retrieval method.
First Performance powers subscription management and card engagement as a turnkey solution to leading processors, networks, and banks globally.
Gem offers a frictionless way for businesses to onboard crypto into their applications, letting developers connect crypto assets and users with just a few lines of code.
Geneva is an online home for groups, clubs, and communities of all shapes and sizes.
Giphy is a search engine and platform provider for animated GIFs.
Goodlight is a risk analytics platform that surfaces potential issues within your workforce.

GreatHorn is a cloud security platform that automatically detects and prevents to the most common source of data breaches: highly targeted spear phishing, credential theft, and fraudulent wire transfer attacks in real time and without impacting end-user productivity.
Group Nine Media is a digital-first media company that boasts billions of video views every month.

Groups provides effective and affordable treatment for addiction. To achieve behavioral change, we bring everyone together. People at different stages of recovery learn from each other, build collective wisdom, and hold each other accountable.
Haitou Global is a global asset allocation platform providing asset management and investment advisory services.
Haystacks.AI uses real estate data, and numerous sources of ancillary data, to augment investment decisions in the single-family RE market.
Highrise is the easiest way to create your avatar identity, make new best friends, stay in the loop, and explore a magical virtual world

Hirehaven provides an online platform for home renovation and improvement services. The company's platform offers a wide selection of high-quality products and helps users get customized online pricing on products for home improvement.
Howaboutwe is a dating site that focuses on what people would like to do on a date rather than whether or not they are swipe-worthy.

HYLA Mobile, formerly eRecyclingCorps, is the world's leading provider of carrier-grade wireless device trade-in solutions. founded in 2009 to provide a scalable model to repurpose and reuse perceptually obsolete devices, HYLA partners with global wireless carriers and retailers to provide instant, in-store trade-in credit. HYLA renews devices to stringent certification standards and sells them to consumers in developing countries at an affordable price thereby bridging the digital divide. HYLA is projected to complete more than 6 million wireless trade-ins worldwide in 2012. HYLA now operates in ten countries worldwide and is a founding member of the Device Renewal Forum.

Founded by a video game industry veteran and a team of AI and 3D software experts, Hypothetic eliminates inefficiencies in the 3D asset creation process to drastically improve productivity, creativity, and collaboration for 3D artists and creative teams. Hypothetic leverages modern advances in generative AI, cloud computing, browser-based collaboration, WebGL and WebGPU to deliver a comprehensive and integrated solution.
HYPR is a cybersecurity company that provides passwordless authentication for users.
iCrossing is a digital marketing company providing planning and development services for brands and agencies.
Imgix is a platform for managing, processing, rendering, optimizing, and delivering your existing images.
InfiCorp provides credit card portfolio management services to banks and credit unions.
K2 Integrity provides specialized risk services and solutions to corporations, sovereign nations and individuals.

Kaleidoscope is a functional CBD capsule taken daily to target specific ailments. Kaleidoscope is unlike the more recreational CBD products currently dominating the market; users are recommended distinct formulations based on their specific needs, and receive their formula on a subscription basis.
Kik lets users connect with friends, groups, and the world around them through chat.
Kindbody is a fertility clinic network and family-building benefits provider for employers offering comprehensive virtual and in-person care.
Kindo elevates the workforce by providing the only truly open AI platform for all businesses.
Knock is an online home-selling platform that provides home-buying and selling services. They use data science and technology to sell homes.

Kroll Bond Rating Agency is a credit rating agency. They provide the investment community with solutions by delivering timely research. They restore credit ratings by assessing risk and providing accurate and transparent ratings.

Ladder is a digital life insurance company that offers flexible term coverage in minutes saving policyholders up to 40%. It uses an all-digital architecture and real-time underwriting to make life insurance as accessible, affordable, and beloved as it should be.

Latch is an operating system of software, products, and services that was designed to help owners, residents, and third parties like guests, couriers, and service providers seamlessly experience the modern building.
Launch Science is an SaaS platform for improving product launches.
LearnBoost is web-based software providing grade book, lesson plan, attendance, and calendar tools for teachers.
Lightning Labs is building the next generation of decentralized, resilient financial infrastructure.
Lucy Goods is a nicotine alternative company that provides superior nicotine product to eliminate tobacco related harm to zero⁣⁣⁣.

Lynk Global is a mobile network technology company that offers universal connectivity for mobile phones. It allows standard mobile phones, without any changes in hardware or software, to be connected virtually anywhere on the globe using low-earth-orbit satellites.
MakerBot Industries creates open source 3D printers.
Managed by Q provides subscription and on-demand office services, from cleaning and maintenance to supply replenishment and wellness.
Massive is the developer of video game network for in-game advertising.
Maude is an essentials brand with a focus on access to sexual wellness products.

Merlin is transforming recruiting for hourly workers in the US, by enabling job seekers to find the best, most relevant jobs close to their homes while helping employers to find, screen and select the best candidates for every opening.
MessageOne offers email management solutions such as EMS and AlertFind for archiving, e-discovery, security and notification services.
Mighty Health connects users to coaches to help them become healthier through exercise, nutrition, and wellness.

Mingyian is a China brand management company for western celebrities and influencers, and is developing the first micro-event platform for celebrities to host online events that engage, grow, and monetize their fan base in the Chinese market.

Mobalytics is an eSports company creating a new, more robust way for competitive gamers to analyze and improve their performance. The company is developing a Gamer Performance Index (GPI) that involves using in-game data available from game APIs and crunching it through machine learning algorithms to analyze and improve player performance acrossseveral areas crucial for competitive gaming.
Moda Operandi is an e-commerce platform for fashion discovery that connects consumers directly with established and emerging designers.

Moov is rebuilding banking infrastructure for a cloud-native world without any legacy technology dependencies. The company’s banking-as-a-service platform takes a developer-first approach of being open-source, portable to cloud providers or on-premises, modular for customization, and decoupled from any single bank program.

Nanit is applying computer vision technology to infant development to help parents better understand their baby’s sleep patterns and health. The Company’s first product, the Nanit camera, is a video baby monitor that provides daily insights on an infant’s patterns of sleep and activity as well as advice for parents.

NerdWallet helps people find the right credit cards, mortgage rates, and refinance their student loans. The company provides consumers with personalized, unbiased advice so they can make smart money moves.
Netcentives provides loyalty and direct marketing solutions. The company delivers a suite of programs for relationship marketing technologies and services for its Global 2000 client base.
Netsertive is an intelligent online marketing platform that puts big brand marketing to work for local businesses.
Nexsan provides energy efficient disk-based storage systems designed for storing and archiving information.
Nihaopay provides financial services to clients investing in Chinese companies.
Nodejitsu is a cloud computing company that offers a node.js platform as a service (PaaS) solution.
NodeSource is a technology company delivering enterprise-grade tools and software targeting the unique needs of running server-side JavaScript at scale.

Nomad Health is an online staffing marketplace that connects clinicians to healthcare jobs. The company eliminates the chaotic healthcare staffing system of yesterday and replaces it with a simple, modern technology platform.

Noom is a psychology-based digital health platform powered by data, technology, and human coaches that helps millions of people meet their personal health and wellness goals from weight management to diabetes prevention to stress reduction.
Northstar is a financial wellness benefit that makes it easy for companies to offer personalized financial advice about comp and benefits.

Novo is a digital banking platform for small business owners, entrepreneurs, and freelancers. It provides better business deposit accounts to today’s companies and is powered by a network of FDIC-insured community banks.

Odyssey Logistics & Technology Corporation (Odyssey) is a global logistics solutions provider with a freight network exceeding $3B globally. Odyssey improves its customers’ supply chain performance through a proprietary, predictive global technology platform, an international network of logistics engineering experts and specialized processes that drive quality, safety and sustainability.

Olo powers digital ordering and delivery programs that connect restaurant brands to the on-demand world. Olo’s platform enables millions of orders per week across every stage of restaurant ecommerce, from fully-branded guest interfaces to the back-of-house order management features that keep over 60,000 restaurants running smoothly.
Ondeck is a technology-enabled financial platform that provides loan financing to small and medium-sized businesses.
One Drop is the whole-person solution for managing diabetes, blood pressure, heart health, and weight.
OpenEnvoy develops financial software intended to solve fraud through accounts payable automation.
Orchestria provides information protection and control software and solutions for organizations.

Ostro is the first full-stack Digital Health Marketing Platform for the pharmaceutical industry.  Ostro is on a mission to help millions of people live healthier lives by being the missing, caring link between those who make medicines, treatments, and diagnostics and those who take them.
OTTO Motors provides self-driving vehicles for safe and efficient material transport inside factories and warehouses.
Palantir builds category-leading software that empowers organizations to create and govern artificial intelligence — across public and private networks.

Palm NFT Studio is a collective of entertainment, technology, cryptoart and art industry leaders set up to on-ramp artists, creators and rights owners who want to establish NFT marketplaces and next-generation creative works on Palm.

Paperless Post seeks to redefine the tradition of paper stationery so that people can send custom, personalized invitations and announcements with the same thought and care as previous generations, but the way we communicate today: online.

Parallel Domain envisions a future where every life on the planet is improved by the transition to safer and more equitable AI. The Company's mission is to accelerate the development of machine perception with synthetic data.
PartnerStack enables companies to leverage partnerships in order to grow revenue, increase distribution, and go to market quicker and more efficiently.
Pattern is a family of brands with products and guidance designed to transform how you enjoy daily life.
Paxos delivers blockchain solutions for financial institutions, including Bankchain, a settlement platform transforming post-trade across capital markets.

Provider of a payment systems platform intended to offer a better and easier way to make payments and get paid. The company's platform offers features such as wallets, pay in flexibility, pay-out, managed acceptance, virtual mastercard, card acceptance, communications platform and others, enabling customers to overcome challenging and complexbusiness and payment situations.

PebblePost is the leading marketing platform for the Programmatic Direct Mail channel, helping hundreds of brands power profitable growth by engaging people at home with timely, relevant marketing mail that’s fueled by online intent, streamlined for speed, and optimized for performance.

Founded by an exceptional cast of robotics and machine learning experts, Pickle creates robots that work alongside people in the very messy world of the loading dock, reducing the backbreaking human effort that goes into getting your online orders to your door.
Pilot is a modern connectivity company providing businesses of all sizes with reliable internet backed by the best customer experience in telecom.

Players' Lounge provides instant esports competitions for casual gamers. Users can search for other players who are willing to throw down a few bucks over their favorite video games, or enter tournaments.
Established in 2003, PrimeRevenue is the global leader in working capital and B2B payment solutions.
Proofpoint is an SaaS-based cybersecurity and compliance company, acquired by Thoma Bravo in 2021.

Prove is the world’s most accurate identity verification and authentication platform.   Proves unique ability to leverage the mobile operator network to directly authorize and process payments drives higher sales conversion and revenue yield for merchants and mobile operators, while managing fraud and revenue leakage.

Qpass is a U.S.-based software provider that provides full cycle of activities for business systems and value-added data services.  Amdocs, a maker of billing software for telecoms and other service providers, acquired QPass in 2006.

Ravn is an augmented reality company helping soldiers see the enemy first. By integrating video feeds from autonomous drones, aircraft and other sources, Ravn is able to deliver critical streams of anticipatory intelligence to soldiers when they need it most.

Ready Robotics is building patented technology that enables adaptive, easy to use, plug-and-play industrial robots that can operate in the dynamic environment of small manufacturers with minimal setup time and effort.
Recyclebank partners with cities and brands to reward residents for helping to make their communities cleaner, greener places.

Redox is a platform for payers, providers and products to connect to EHRs and every other healthcare data source.  Redox exists to improve healthcare by uniting patients and providers through easily accessible technology.
Revolution Money is a financial services company offering services such as credit cards, debit cards and money transfers.
Revolution Space, formerly Accion, develops advanced technologies for the new space industry.
Ripple is the leading provider of crypto-enabled solutions for businesses. The Company aims to build breakthrough crypto solutions for a world without economic borders.
Sailthru's cross-channel marketing platform is purposefully built for helping marketers deliver personalized experiences to each and every consumer across email, web, and mobile.
ScreenMeet is screen sharing that enables apps, information and presentations to be shared instantly from your phone and computer to any device.

Securrency is powering global digital assets marketplaces with compliance aware tokenization, as well as account management services, liquidity settlement, analytics, and reporting for asset issuers, brokers, exchanges, and banks.
Sequel created a leakage-preventing tampon.

Shortcut (formerly Clubhouse) is a modern project management tool built by and for software engineers. Its unique filtering system gives teams an unprecedented level of visibility across teams and projects.
SideTour provides a community marketplace enabling users to find and host activities such as tours, dine- outs, and rides with other users.
Silvertree is on a mission to empower the world’s aging population by developing next-gen wearable technology that provides the right form of safety and connection for active older adults.
SinglePlatform enables local businesses to publish information about their products, services, and menus across social media platforms.

By analyzing post content and audience behavior across millions of posts and thousands of social pages, Socialflow by Piano’s AI-powered publishing tool optimizes every post in the queue to distribute them during periods of peak audience engagement.

By providing unique data from any point on Earth, every hour, Spire offers a competitive advantage for organizations that require insight into areas such as global trade, weather, shipping and supply chain, illegal fishing, and maritime domain awareness.
Spring Health is a comprehensive mental health solution for employers and health plans.
Spring Labs is on a mission to transform data exchange with unprecedented privacy and security.
Staircase develops modern mortgage infrastructure with developer friendly APIs.
Stella Connect is a customer feedback and quality management platform built specifically for customer service teams.
Supergreat is a beauty community of real people reviewing the beauty products that work for them.
Tacit Networks provides wide area file services and wide area network optimization solutions for branch office and remote users.
Taleo is a provider of cloud-based talent management solutions, enabling businesses to recruit eligible candidates.
TapCommerce specialized in mobile app retargeting and driving revenue & engagement beyond the install.
Taqua manufactures and supplies switching systems and applications that include packet interface cards and broadband interface cards.
Mobot is a QA-as-a-service platform using real mechanical robots to automate testing on real mobile devices.
Telocity is a provider of residential broadband services and applications to and throughout the home.
HuffPost, an online news aggregator and blog, publishes content on politics, entertainment, world news, sports, and technology.

The Outline is a new kind of publication founded by journalists and storytellers, dedicated to telling the right stories for right now.  Coverage is focused on the increasingly complex confluence of culture, power, and technology.
TheSkimm offers an email newsletter that is focused on women, and provides editorial contents and headlines.
TheSquareFoot is a marketplace that helps companies find office spaces.
Thinkful provides 1-on-1 learning with industry experts to bring high growth tech careers to their students.

Tinybop is a studio building a series of iOS apps about the universal questions kids wonder about: what they’re made of, and how and why things work. Our apps are digital toys that model the real world, designed to delight and educate kids around the globe.
Tippr is a deals network that power deal sites for top publishers, provide targeted reach to merchants, and bring great deals to consumers.
Tive develops a hardware and software platform designed to track the conditions of shipments.
Token has developed a biometric-based wearable authentication ring that mitigates the primary cause of data breaches and ransomware losses.
Trusted Insight is an LP network that provides institutional investors with curated news, jobs, rankings, events, and a forum.
Understory is an insurance company that develops smart weather station micro-grids.

Ursa Space Systems is a space 3.0 analytics-as-a-service company that brings transparency to global markets to help traders and analysts in the finance and energy industries make more informed decisions. It uses space-based data from radar satellites as the source of its timely reports.
Vastera is a leading provider of web-based software products and services that facilitate international buying and selling of goods.
Venmo offers an app that allows users to share and make payments with friends for a variety of services.

VTS is a real estate CRM software company bringing together landlords, brokers, and tenants to make deals happen. The company empowers landlords and brokers to better attract, convert, and retain valuable assets and tenants by centralizing all of the critical data and workflows in one place.
VigLink is a platform for monetizing content-driven commerce for publishers, bloggers, forums, social networks and apps.
Vine is an online platform that enables users to create short looping video clips for friends and family.
Visiprise offers manufacturing planning, execution, quality management solutions and support for integrated manufacturing operations.
Vivre operates as an online retailer of apparel, bags, jewelry, and other accessories for women, men, and children.
Vocera Communications is a medtech company that offers communication systems and solutions for healthcare professionals and patients.
Wag! is a mobile application used to instantly find trusted and certified dog walkers.
Wallaroo provides an enterprise AI platform that enables clients to deploy ML and analytics projects into production.
WatchGuard Technologies provides cutting-edge cyber security technology including network security, secure wi-fi, & MFA.
Wave focuses on interactive virtual experiences with a mission to help artists make money at the intersection of gaming and entertainment.
WayUp connects students with jobs during and after college -- from summer internships to part-time gigs to full-time jobs after graduation.
WeWork is a platform for creators that transforms buildings into dynamic environments for creativity, focus, and collaboration.
Wedding Channel is a wedding portal that helps couples with consumer needs.
WhipTail Technologies commercializes an all-flash enterprise storage array that addresses performance issues in data centers.
WisdomTree is a global financial innovator that offers a diverse selection of exchange-traded products (ETPs), models, and solutions.
Workit Health is a virtual clinic dedicated to medically-assisted treatment and online therapy for substance use disorder.
Xobni creates complete and searchable social profiles of a user's contacts that include updates from LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter.
Yhat provides an end-to-end data science platform for developing, deploying, and managing real-time decision APIs.
YipitData is the market research firm that analyzes data points to provide accurate insights for the disruptive economy.
YouWorld connects global brands, retailers and on-trip service providers with Chinese outbound travelers.
